attributes.action: Hold authorities to account as 50% of pupils got none of their school choices
attributes.additional_details: The consultation that Hethersett Academy are required to undertake prior to changes to their admission criteria (School Admissions Code 2021), was inadequate - feeder schools and affected parents were not consulted. Mulbarton Primary School children have been unfairly disadvantaged, in a further breach of the School Admissions Code, the Local Authority has failed to adequately oversee the process, this resulted in 50% of Mulbarton pupils not receiving any of their three secondary school choices.
attributes.background: Parliament to investigate the failure of Admission Authorities to provide meaningful preferences and adequately consult on changes to admission criteria putting Mulbarton children at a profound disadvantage Resolve the injustice by providing temporary capacity until the school extension is completed

rejection.details: You may wish to contact your local council regarding this matter. You can find contact details here: https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council
